title: BACnetClientConfPrivateTransfer (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK PUBLIC FINAL BACnetClientConfPrivateTransfer EXTENDS
BACnetClientBase
Common Behaviour Model conform (ETrigA) FB to execute a ConfirmedPrivateTransfer-Request in the BACnet-Network.
If execution completed successfully and xDone is TRUE, result is filled with valid data,
in any other case the data in result are not valid.

rows.Name: xExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts defined operationFALSE: Resets the defined operation after ready condition was reached

rows:
Max. operating time for executing
[Âµs], 0: No operating time limit

rows.Name: dwTargetDeviceNumber
rows.Comment:
The device number of the targeted device in the BACnet-
Network.

rows:
Optional: The device address of the targeted device in the BACnet-Network. If
an adress is given the given device number is ignored.

rows.Name: eStatus
rows.Comment: If an error occured, the error state.

rows:
If an error occured (this means eStatus <> BACNET_STATUS_OK), whereas the sent BACnet-Request was answered
with an specific error information, the latter is contained in this structure.

The State in which the FB is during execution:0: No execution, resetted state1: Searching for the Target-Device and a valid address for it2: Sending the BACnet-Request into the network3: Waiting for the answer (if there is one) to the BACnet-Request made in 24: Finishing the call, setting of the output variables

rows.Name: nVendorID
rows.Comment:
This parameter, of type Unsigned, specifies the unique vendor
identification code for the type of vendor-proprietary service to be
performed.

rows:
This parameter, of type Unsigned, specifies the desired service to be
performed.
If set to True the parameters value is valid.

This optional parameter shall transport additional parameters for the service
specified by âVendor IDâ and âService Numberâ. The datatype and
interpretation of these parameters is a local matter.

This is the size of the filled bytes in the parameters buffer on reply
to the confirmed service variant of this type.

rows.Name: result
rows.Comment:
If the BACnet-Request succeeded (xDone is TRUE and no error occured (xError is FALSE)), this
variable holds the result of the request.
